description.value:
Pathfinder Society researchers recently created elemental wayfinders with the assistance of the Society's elemental allies. In addition to the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Wayfinder], these wayfinders each grant the ability to cast a particular elemental spell once per day, and can assist Pathfinders in exploring areas associated with their element. Each has the trait associated with its element.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect The wayfinder can cast 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hydraulic Torrent].

Additionally, you gain the constent effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Water Breathing].

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide
